name: The Temples of the Zodiac
description:
Perinthia has fallen to famine and poverty, it's up to you to visit all twelve temples of the zodiac in order to restore Perinthia to its former glory. In this level, explore through the temple of the Aries by utilizing unique movement to recover three ancient gems.

Controls:

Walk: W, A, S, D

Jump: SPACE Bar Sprint: Hold SHIFT while walking Slide: Hold CTRL while sprinting

Wall jumping : While close to another wall, press SPACE (look in the direction of the wall you want to jump to while holding SHIFT, this eases wall jumping. This mechanic is probably the most clunky and it's the hardest to get used to and requires practice)

Wall running: While close to a wall, hold SPACE bar

Game Design Document:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1tdVo6qYBj8bOo7lShu8Kw4aEFcvnFUDvhboQ4u8YXSk/...
